title: CITY GUIDE
subTitle: Tainan: The City of Angels
description: Located in the southern part of Taiwan, Tainan is the oldest city on the island. With a rich cultural heritage, delicious street food, and numerous historical sites, it's often called the cultural capital of Taiwan. Explore the ancient temples, stroll through old streets, and immerse yourself in the unique ambiance of this beautiful city.
